problem.markdown:
>>All of the following describe an increase in entropy EXCEPT:<< (x) a cup of water placed in the freezer turns into ice () transmission of electricity over power lines results in loss of energy as heat and sound () a pot of hot coffee left alone will gradually cool down () a room tends to become disorganized over time
[explanation] Energy is required to convert liquid water to solid ice. Ice melting would be an example of increasing entropy. [explanation]
